---
title: Contribution to Science template (2,000 chars)
parent: Templates & Worksheets
nav_order: 2
---

# Contribution to Science template (copy/paste)

## Structure (recommended)

**Contribution title:** [short phrase]

**Problem/context:**  
[1–2 sentences on the state of the field / gap]

**Your key contribution:**  
[2–4 sentences on what you did; be specific about your role]

**Impact:**  
[2–4 sentences on why it mattered; downstream adoption, clinical impact, etc.]

**Products that evidence this contribution:**  
“See Other Significant Products #__ (and #__ if needed).”
